example.parse: (S (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC يوم) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))) (VP (PV_PASS+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS اعتبر) (NP-SBJ-1 (NOUN_PROP نواز) (NOUN_PROP شريف)) (S (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC متخاذلا) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN القضية) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN التاريخية) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الوطنية)) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المركزية) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN_PROP باكستان) (PUNC ,) (NOUN_PROP كشمير))))))))) (PUNC .)))

arg.g: in central national historical cause of Pakistan
